benchmark_details.name: OllaBench
benchmark_details.overview: OllaBench is a novel evaluation framework that assesses LLMsâ€™ accuracy, wastefulness, and consistency in answering scenario-based information security compliance and non-compliance questions, built on 24 cognitive behavioral theories and empirical evidence from 38 peer-reviewed papers.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a tool for evaluating the performance of large language models in the context of cybersecurity compliance and non-compliance.

data.source: Generated dataset based on cognitive behavioral theories and empirical evidence.

methodology.calculation: Categorical accuracy is calculated by the number of correct responses divided by the total number of questions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in answering compliance/non-compliance questions.
